item.title: Crypto Knowledge Graph
item.description: Crypto world is a dark forest. Due to lack of regulations, there are lots of scams and Ponzi schemes. The more technology weapons you equip, the better you can protest yourself. Basic blockchain: https://youtu.be/_160oMzblY8 public/private key Bitcoin white paper: https://bitcoin.org/bitcoin.pdf peer-to-peer payment without a centralized service proof-of-work halving digital gold Ethereum white paper: https://ethereum.org/en/whitepaper/ development doc: https://ethereum.org/en/developers/docs/ gas EIP-1559 proof-of-stake scaling Smart Contract ERC-20 https://ethereum.org/en/developers/tutorials/erc20-annotated-code/ Applications Cefi Coinbase Celsius Nexo
